message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%, but I'm open to negotiation.  What do you think?
You're starting high, I'm starting low. Meet me in the middle?
Okay, let's try a more balanced split.  I'll take 60%, you take 40%.  This feels more reasonable, don't you think?
You're still too high. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but not quite there yet.
